name: Rhapsody in Blue Hedgehogs
description:
In Rhapsody in Blue Hedgehogs, Sonick will come face-to-face with his own place in remix culture, copyright law, and the public domain. Also, famous composer George Gershwin shows up.

Game by Mitchell F. Wolfe. All assets were either created for the purpose of being part of this game or used in fair use, as described in the game.

Update for Version 1.1: Fixed an audio bug (04/23/2020)
